title.en: Prayer to the Sovereign of Dharma and Retinue

text.en: Your eight close heart-sons, the bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: changchub sempa nyewé sé chen gyé

text.en: And the sixteen great and noble elders,
Turn your attention towards me, inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: dak la gong shing jingyi lab par dzö

text.en: Free me from all diseases, harmful spirits and obstructors,
text.en-trans: dak ni nedön nöpa kün lé drol

text.en: And accomplish great benefit for the teachings and sentient beings.
text.en-trans: ten dang dro la penpé dön chen drub

text.en: Cause the qualities of experience and realization to increase in me,
text.en-trans: nyam dang tokpé yönten gongpel né

text.en: And inspire me with your blessings so that I may seize the stronghold of bliss!
